input_text:
Job Title: Senior Project Manager

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Overview

Job Purpose

ICE Data Services is seeking an experienced and results focused Senior Project Manager to work on our strategic development and growth initiatives. This hands-on role works directly with senior technology and business leaders as well as development teams to manage commercially-focused projects, programs and new initiatives. Strong communication, leadership and attention to detail are required along with a focus on project organization, management and effective collaboration with key stakeholders.

This role is heavily focused on managing several development projects as well as the overall program portfolio for ICE Data Services. The successful candidate must effectively operate in a fast-paced, hands-on and dynamic development environment where new business opportunities are pursued quickly. This role requires flexibility of processes to effectively manage development efforts to meet the respective business deliverables.

Responsibilities

Program and project level management and reporting to key senior stakeholdersActive management of Agile storyboards for development as well as the construction and management of the Project workplanApplies project management best practices across all work effortsManaging different work efforts using both Agile and Waterfall methodologiesActive management of project and program-related risks, issues, reporting and timely tracking of actions across project stakeholders ownersEscalation and resolution of impacts to key project milestonesManagement of allocated project resources and work efforts, as well as proactive identification/resolution of resource contention issues with respective managersCreation and execution of a communications plan/matrix across all project team stakeholdersOrganization of key interactions amongst project teams aligned to the final deliverableOwnership over all key project artifacts from requirements, specifications, plans, status, checklists and approvalsOwnership of the change management process as project execution progresses through to closure – deployment management remains the responsibility of the Development ManagerCoordinate efforts with cross-functional teams with diverse skill-sets and functional areas

Knowledge And Experience

Bachelor’s degreeExcellent communication and leadership skills10+ years in project management experience on technology and product development efforts5+ years managing large project of work focused on commercial product deliveryExperience managing multiple projects concurrentlyExperience working with senior technology, business leaders and development teamsSelf-starter and ability to work independentlyApplied experience managing efforts with MS Project and Agile storyboardsProven ability to quickly earn the trust of sponsors and key stakeholders; mobilize and motivate teams; set direction and approach; resolve conflict; deliver tough messages with grace; execute with limited information and ambiguityStrong interpersonal skills; able to establish and maintain a close working relationship with Product, Quantitative , Financial Engineering and Software Development teamsEnjoy a fast-paced, high-intensity environment.Work well as part of a team with minimal supervision.Well organized with the ability to manage multiple priorities

Preferred Experience

10+ years in financial service industry; experience with market data vendors a plus with an understanding of quantitative financial markets concepts.Master’s degree a plus.PMP CertificationFixed Income knowledge preferred

Schedule

This role offers work from home flexibility of up to 2 days per week.

Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin or ancestry, age, disability or veteran status, or other protected status.

Experience Level (if available): None
